testsuite.name: Computhink.Script.My_Preferences_Add_signature
testsuite.system-out: Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field UserName Details: Dipak Enter valid password into password field Select a Room Selected Room name: demoserver.demoroom Captcha is not present, proceeding with login. Click Login button Session for user is already active. Do you want to create a new session? Dialog box displayed. User clicks OK button. Session message did not appear. Proceeding with login. User has logged in successfully

Test Scenario 1 : Verifying Upload New Signature Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on Refresh button Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Select Office document and set as Default view Select Pdf document and set as Default view Click on Apply button Click on Refresh button Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Click on Add signature button By using AutoIT add file from external folder Check on Protect password Icon Click on Save button Enter a Password The Successfully:Signature Uploaded. this message should show New signature Upload Successfully Click on New Document Tab Click on Destination Folder Textbox Expand a Cabinet Expand a Drawer select a Folder Click on Ok button Select Document type dropdown Enter value Report Name field Browse Document Page By using AutoIT add file from external folder Click on signature menu Option Enter a Password New signature added Successfully on Document Click on Create button New Document Created successfully with signature

Test Scenario 2 : Verifying New Signature Type Scenario 01: Log into a EWA Enter valid user name into username field Click on Refresh button Click on Setting Icon Click on My Preferences Select Office document and set as Default view Select Pdf document and set as Default view Click on Apply button Click on Add Signature button Enter a Password Select sign type Check Password Protect Icon Select signature Font Enter Signature Name Select again New Signature Font Enter signature Name Click on Save button Enter a Password The Successfully:Signature Uploaded. this message should show Click on the Upload button Click on New Document Tab Click on Destination Folder textbox Expand a Cabinet Expand a Drawer select a Folder Click on Ok button Select document type dropdown Enter Report name Browse Document Page By using AutoIT add file from external folder Click on Signature menu Option Enter a Password New signature type added Successfully on Document Click on Create button New Document Created successfully with signature type Click on Refresh button
